document.full_text: four pakistanis have been charged as co-conspirators in the 2008 mumbai attack that killed 166 people, including six americans, u.s. prosecutors said on monday.
document.title: u.s. charges pakistanis in 2008 mumbai attack plot
lines_and_colors: four pakistanis have been charged as co-conspirators in the 2008 mumbai attack that killed 166 people, including six americans, u.s. prosecutors said on monday.
